questions.questionText: What are meta tags in HTML ?

options.text: Meta tags are those tags which go inside the Head tag of the HTML page
Meta tags are not for the interface they are important for the browser.
Meta Tags are always in name or value pairs
Meta tags consist of character encoding, title, or even description.

questions.explanation: Meta tags are those tags which go inside the Head tag of the HTML page

questions.questionText: What property is used to change the text color of an element?
questions.explanation: color is  used to change the text color of an element

questions.questionText: What keyword is used to create a JavaScript variable?
questions.explanation: var: It is used to hold any JavaScript data type.

questions.questionText: Which of the following function of String object returns the character at the specified index?
questions.explanation: charAt(): While charAt() returns the char of specified index, charCodeAt() returns the unicode

questions.questionText: In which of these does a class take parameters?
questions.explanation: a constructor is used by a class to take in parameters

questions.questionText: How can you print information to the console?
questions.explanation: console.log(info): Other console methods are console.dir(), console.time() and others.

questions.questionText: Which keyword allows us to share information between files in TypeScript?
questions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

questions.questionText: var a = []; What does 'typeof a' return?
questions.explanation: object: Arrays are considered a special type of object in JavaScript

questions.questionText: How is a property accessible within a class?
questions.explanation: this.propertyName is the way to access a specific property within a class
